Ennis City Commission - Ward 1

### [Ward 1 Map](https://gissolutions.halff.com/portal/apps/sites/#/ennis/apps/90587bcbe9524ab5bc3570302906d806/explore) [Click to Access](https://gissolutions.halff.com/portal/apps/sites/#/ennis/apps/90587bcbe9524ab5bc3570302906d806/explore) [Voting Ward GIS Map](https://gissolutions.halff.com/portal/apps/sites/#/ennis/apps/90587bcbe9524ab5bc3570302906d806/explore)

![](https://www.ennistx.gov/media/Ward_Maps_3_25/Ward 1 Map.jpg?width=300)

### **Cathy Falkenbach - City Commissioner Ward 1**

Commissioner Falkenbach is currently serving her first term as Commissioner for Ward 1. She was elected in November 2024 to a term expiring May 2027.
Cathy is a graduate of Ennis High School and  of Texas A&M Commerce with a BAAS in Business Administration.
She and her husband Jimmy have three children, Jeremy , Brandon, and MaRisa as well as four grandchildren.

Contact:
[Email](mailto:ward1@ennistx.gov)

![](https://www.ennistx.gov/media/New Site Files/C92A6772.jpg?width=300)

### **Cathy Falkenbach**

Contact:
[Email](mailto:ward1@ennistx.gov)

Commissioner Falkenbach was elected in November 2024 to a term expiring in May 2027.
